name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ezcmac, UntilYouAreSoNude, Sleeps, littlecat, mikeronomicon, Thorfinn, wildcat, DiamondMonster, gothfae, DeimosRising, fancypants, atticusonline, lk, aHatOfPig, Afkpuz, littlefatdog, dropkickpikachu, stormagnet)

name: envika
text: A comment left by envika was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wotan, trisha, St-Elmos_Fire, Nlaw, Satyr, kestral)

name: the_doz
text: Your avatar should basically be applied to the cover of all Thompson Twins albums.

name: envika
text: i'm not sure if that's a good or a bad thing

name: bixschmix
text: Mr. Yuck is appropriate for many musical stylings, not just the Thompson Twins.

name: mikeronomicon
text: A comment left by mikeronomicon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by prolefeed5, riotdejaneiro, goocifer, wotan, mercuri0us, Xaxx, holly_golightly, Myre, Satyr, Appers, kestral)

name: i_love_kate
text: Seriously, calm down.

name: ted0phile
text: I didn't know having Tourette's of the fingers was even possible.

name: greenkoolayd
text: you are the biggest pussy, ever.

name: mangtastic
text: I think your reaction was a bit harsh, but I have to admit I giggled out loud at "exploding fiery ass cancer you cock scab."

name: theseknives
text:
Ray really is kind of like a goth Bootsy Collins.

Also, Gay KISS.

name: suprememongoose
text: A comment left by suprememongoose was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, Hipjiverobot, Dwilow)

name: tekende
text:
It implies the existence of a straight KISS.

Oh, snap!

name: libelandslander
text: Are you implying that the ladies from kiss don't like men?

name: tekende
text:
Aheheh. I see what you did there.


I think.

name: hexjumper
text:
This is Ray in a nutshell. If he can't beat you, he'll join you. And then he'll spend way too much money trying to join you and ruin the whole thing for you.

Ray without money would not be funny, because Ray is fundamentally a creature of impulses and desires, and without a huge sack of cash to fund those impulses and desires, he wouldn't be Ray.

name: chaesar
text: Like having a huge "R" on his bedroom door, and leaving used dishes on the floor outside of it, like it was a hotel or something.

name: julia
text: He would just be a meth addict.

name: riazm
text: He would be Showbiz.

name: aaron_haynes
text: He is always in search of the next better way to live life.

name: thatcrazycommie
text: I disagree. Ray without money was still pretty funny.

name: zem
text: I was thinking more along these lines

name: carpetbag
text: At the risk of both ruining this strip for others and looking like a dang old fool, what does a homo say three times?

name: wehavemagnums
text: I'm not falling for that one again!

name: carpetbag
text: OHHHHHHH. Ha ha! Thank you for your assistance, good sir.

name: epicurus
text: Panels 2 and 3, and then "hella start munchin' on some skeleton bones" makes me give this one a five, yes I did it.

name: gouldgonewild
text: Oh my god. This gets a 5 just for the name of the strip.

name: biddlebubbly
text:
"That we can use to listen to"

Note that he generally wouldn't classify Thompson Twins tapes as something to be listened to. Neither do I.

name: cracklewater
text: Seems like a beautifully precise employment of the term - "use" as in "improvise", as in "my family uses frisbees as plates".

name: mr_lostman28
text:
The goth Bootsy Collins alt text had me nearly in tears. I've never laughed that hard at a webcomic......


... ever.

name: plusigot125
text: I like how whenever Ray senses Little Nephew is getting turned on to destructive, dangerous, or just plain asinine habits, he goes all reverse psychology to make him feel all ashamed of his new interest.

name: scriblerus
text: every strip in this arc gets a 5.

name: phy
text:
What other kind of bones would you expect to find, Ray

marzipan bones?

name: dasilodavi
text: Why are these things in his closet?  It makes me worry that they will show up in my closet!

name: molesticide
text:
i am delighted by the use of punctuation

in ray's thought bubbles

name: tourach3
text: the thompson twins mention does it for me

name: eatmorekix
text: goth Little Nephew speaks only in italics.

name: stormagnet
text: Aw, man. No matter how hard I try, I can't stop hearing Ray's voice as Kyle's mom in panel 3.

name: erinye
text: We should start a support group.

name: tttt2
text: I initially read the last line as "that we can used to listen to," which I think is an improvement

name: lechatnoir
text: I like how Ray is wearing a very small witch hat, and an ankh necklace.

name: pogo
text: And skull glasses.

name: invidious
text: Ray kinda looks more like a Goth Elton John.

name: drsprinkl
text: there is a small water droplet perhaps from a sneeze on my monitor in exactly the place to make it look like a single tear is coming from little nephew's left eye in panel two

name: atticusonline
text: god dammit ray do NOT wear a cape!

name: daidai
text: As a goth kid, the adverb "sadly" must precede at least 65% of all spoken sentences in which it would be appropriate to do so.

name: possums
text:
"use to listen to"

Oh god this sounds like the way Japanese grammar is conjugated in my first year book...

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i concur whole-heartedly.

name: wallabeechamp
text: Goth Bootsy Collins would punnish.

name: carlyle
text: Ray is a good cat.

name: riotdejaneiro
text: I wonder if goth-ray is still wearing that thong...black cape   black thong = one hell of a goth dude
